alert.note: Alert for Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 9:11AM EST until December 25 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Periods of heavy ocean effect snow into Sunday morning. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches are expected through Sunday morning although amounts will vary considerably over short distances. * WHERE...Dukes MA County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Untreated will be snow covered and slippery. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph with visibility down to one quarter of a mile of at times will result in poor visibility at times with blowing and drifting snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 45 mph with visibility down to one quarter of a mile of at times. This will result in poor visibility at times with blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
